text: Hi Giovanni - apologies for the delay, I've been out of office. Can you rerun the command with the `--debug` flag and send me the results?

Hi all, if you were experiencing issues with the new marketplace CLI validation returning `Internal Error. Failed to fetch dependencies for {{file name}}. Please try again` I just pushed a fix for this. Please try again now and if you experience continued issues for this, feel free to DM me
